entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
